readme:
# daverona-mellow-syntax

A port of Dayle Rees's Mellow color theme for Atom

## Preview

![Screenshot](./screenshot.png)

## Installation

To *install* daverona-mellow-syntax, run apm command in a terminal:

```bash
apm install daverona-mellow-syntax
```

To *uninstall* daverona-mellow-syntax, run apm command in a terminal:

```bash
apm uninstall daverona-mellow-syntax
```

## References

* [https://github.com/daylerees/colour-schemes](https://github.com/daylerees/colour-schemes)
